title: Spike Feresten (Spike's Car Radio)
description:
Spike is a TV writer and the host of Spike's Car Radio. On this episode we talk about Spike's conflicted relationship with his Tesla's autopilot, his Harley Livewire tester, GT3 Touring issues, Beetles, watches, and what car to take to a black tie event.

This show was recorded on October 14, 2021. 

 

For a limited time, my listeners get their first month free - and, after you’ve been a member, CrowdHealth will include a Fitness Wearable. That’s 30 days to try risk-free plus the Fitness Wearable. Just go to JoinCrowdHealth.com/fit and enter code Tire at sign up.

 

When you purchase a 3-month Babbel subscription, you’ll get an additional 3 months for free. Just go to BABBEL.com and use promo code TIRE.

 

Go to blackvue.com/TST and use the promo code TIRE to get 10% off of any BlackVue dashcam. Free shipping for orders over $200.

 

Download the DraftKings Sportsbook app now, use promo code TIRE, bet $1 on this Sunday’s Formula Racing Grand Prix and win $100 in free bets if any driver finishes a lap. 

 

Want early access to this episode? To watch the live stream? Bonus shows, or ad-free shows? Join our Patreon!  Go to https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast and check out the tiers. It all starts at just $3/month!
